text: In this April 7, 2006, file photo, ` ` Playboy'' founder Hugh Hefner is photographed at the Playboy Mansion in the Holmby Hills area of Los Angeles. Hugh Hefner's death certificate from the Los Angeles County Department of Public Health, obtained by the Blast, reveals his official cause of death : The Playboy founder contracted the blood infection septicemia and a form of E. coli that was ` ` highly resistant to antibiotics,'' and he ultimately died of cardiac arrest and respiratory failure, People reports.
